about.translators_description: A huge thank you to all of these translators for making this project as accessible as possible
about.administrators_description: These users are people that help offer higher level support for the bot
about.developers_description: These are the core contributors to the project
about.owners_description: This is the owner of Prosperity
about.bot_description: Prosperity is a levelling bot ready to skill up and boost up your Discord server. We pride ourselves on openness, transparency and collaboration

ignoredchannels.channel_now_ignored: %channel% 將會從獲取 xp 被忽略
ignoredchannels.channel_now_not_ignored: %channel% 不會從獲取 xp 被忽略

ignoredroles.role_now_not_ignored: %role% 不會從獲取 xp 被忽略

language.choice_message: Please choose below whether you want to set your own language, or the server language

level.not_spoken_yet: 你還沒在機器人可以看見你的位置說過話
level.your_current_level:
你正在 **%level%** 級
要得到下一級別，你需要 **%xp%** xp
level.user_current_level:
%user% 正在 **%level%** 級
要得到下一級別，他們需要 **%xp%** xp

levelroles.role_already_used: %role% 已經在被一個級別用於
levelroles.role_granted: %role% 會在 **%level% 級** 上授予
levelroles.role_granted_status:
%role% 會在 **%level% 級** 上授予
**狀態**：
正在給 %amount% 個成員這個角色
levelroles.role_granted_status_complete:
%role% 會在 **%level% 級** 上授予
**狀態**：
把這個角色給了 %amount% 個成員
levelroles.role_removed: %role% 將不會在 **%level% 級** 上授予

levels.user_doesnt_exist: 從機器人被加入時後，%user% 沒有在聊天室裡說過話
levels.level_to_give_must_be_positive: 要給予的級別必須要是正數
levels.level_to_take_must_be_positive: 要拿走的級別必須要是正數
levels.levels_taken: 把 %amount% 個級別從 %user% 拿走了

settings.notification_channel_updated: 成功把在提高級別的通知更新了，他們將會在 %channel% 裡發送
settings.notification_type_reply_description: 通過回答導致提高級別消息的短信發送提高級別的消息
settings.notification_type_channel_description: 在規定的頻道裡發送提高級別消息
settings.notification_type_dm_description: 通過私信發送提高級別消息
settings.please_select: 請在下面的列表上選擇你想要的通知型...
settings.role_type_stacked: Users will now have stacked roles and their previous roles will not be removed
settings.role_type_single: Users will now have single roles and their previous roles will be removed
settings.multiplier_set: This guild now has a **%multiplier%x** multiplier assigned

guild_settings_notifications.channel: Please use the slash command `/settings notifications` and specify the channel
guild_settings_notifications.dm: Successfully updated level up notifications to be sent via **Direct Messages**
guild_settings_notifications.disable: Successfully updated level up notifications to be disabled
